sentences.sContent: The prison is close to anarchy.
sentences.sCn: 那所监狱几乎一片混乱。

sentences.sContent: The classroom was in a constant state of anarchy .
sentences.sCn: 教室里永远是一片混乱。

synos.tran: 无政府状态；混乱；无秩序

words.tran: 无政府的；无政府主义的；无法无天的

trans.tranCn: 无政府状态；混乱；无秩序
trans.tranOther: a situation in which there is no effective government in a country or no order in an organization or situation
